title: Project: CRUD App to Make Places

cells.data:
I am going to build an API that:
- Handles CRUD (create, read, update, delete) for places.
- Have a standard URL (`http://example.com/api/places` and `http://example.com/api/places/:place_id`)
- Utilize HTTP `GET`, `POST`, `PUT`, `DElETE`
- Return JSON Data
- Log all requests to the console.

Open last session. Show 

add hide if they are shown
remove hide if aria-controls === data-weather
